languages.text: "Его зовут Медный шепот, хотя это, конечно, не настоящее имя. Почтенный {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магос{/g} является членом моей свиты — порой долг перед Императором заставляет меня столкнуться с технологиями {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}, и Медный шепот обеспечивает мою безопасность в такие моменты".

traits.locale_text: "Его зовут Железный шепот, хотя это, конечно, не настоящее имя. Почтенный магос является членом моей свиты — порой долг перед Императором заставляет меня столкнуться с ксенаритскими технологиями, и Железный шепот обеспечивает мою безопасность в такие моменты".

languages.text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."
languages.original_text: "Его зовут Медный шепот, хотя это, конечно, не настоящее имя. Почтенный {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магос{/g} является членом моей свиты — порой долг перед Императором заставляет меня столкнуться с технологиями {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}, и Медный шепот обеспечивает мою безопасность в такие моменты".

traits.locale_text: "They call him Ironwhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed magos is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with xenos technology, and Ironwhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

"They call him Ironwhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed magos is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with xenos technology, and Ironwhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

"This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xeno-{/g}technology, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

"This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xeno-{/g}technology, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

"This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

languages.text: 「こちらはブラスウィスパーです。当然ながら本名ではありません。尊敬受けし{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}賢人{/g}にも供をしてもらっています。皇帝から{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異星技術{/g}に対処するよう仰せつかっておりますので、その際には私の安全をブラスウィスパーに確保してもらっているのです」
languages.original_text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

traits.locale_text: 「こちらはブラスウィスパーです。当然ながら本名ではありません。尊敬受けし{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}賢人{/g}にも供をしてもらっています。皇帝から{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異星技術{/g}に対処するよう仰せつかっておりますので、その際には私の安全をブラスウィスパーに確保してもらっているのです」

languages.text: “这位是铜语，自然，这不是他的真名。这位受人尊敬的{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}是我的随从。有的时候，出于对帝皇的责任，我不得不与{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形科技{/g}打交道。每当这种时候，铜语都会确保我的安全。”
languages.original_text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

traits.locale_text: “这位是铜语，自然，这不是他的真名。这位受人尊敬的{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}是我的随从。有的时候，出于对帝皇的责任，我不得不与{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形科技{/g}打交道。每当这种时候，铜语都会确保我的安全。”

languages.text: «Este es Susurro de latón. Obviamente, no es su nombre real. El estimado {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} es miembro de mi séquito. En ocasiones, mis deberes hacia el Emperador me exigen tratar con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotecnología{/g}. Susurro de latón vela por mi seguridad en esos momentos».
languages.original_text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

traits.locale_text: «Este es Susurro de latón. Obviamente, no es su nombre real. El estimado {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} es miembro de mi séquito. En ocasiones, mis deberes hacia el Emperador me exigen tratar con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotecnología{/g}. Susurro de latón vela por mi seguridad en esos momentos».

languages.text: « Voici Murmecuivre, ce qui, bien sûr, n'est pas son vrai nom. L'honorable {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} fait partie de mon entourage. Mes devoirs envers l'Empereur m'obligent parfois à avoir recours à la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénotechnologie{/g}, et quand c'est le cas, Murmecuivre veille à ma sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

traits.locale_text: « Voici Murmecuivre, ce qui, bien sûr, n'est pas son vrai nom. L'honorable {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} fait partie de mon entourage. Mes devoirs envers l'Empereur m'obligent parfois à avoir recours à la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénotechnologie{/g}, et quand c'est le cas, Murmecuivre veille à ma sécurité. »

languages.text: "Das ist Messingflüsterer, aber natürlich heißt er nicht wirklich so. Der geschätzte {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} gehört zu meinem Gefolge – meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperator zwingt mich bisweilen zum Umgang mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenotechnologie{/g}, und Messingflüsterer sorgt dann für meine Sicherheit."
languages.original_text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Messingflüsterer, aber natürlich heißt er nicht wirklich so. Der geschätzte {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} gehört zu meinem Gefolge – meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperator zwingt mich bisweilen zum Umgang mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenotechnologie{/g}, und Messingflüsterer sorgt dann für meine Sicherheit."

languages.text: "Seni Pirinçfısıltı ile tanıştırayım. Elbette gerçek adı bu değil. Saygıdeğer {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g}, maiyetimdendir. İmparator'a olan vazifem gereği zaman zaman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno teknolojileri{/g} ile uğraşıyorum. Pirinçfısıltı, o anlarda güvenliğimi sağlıyor."
languages.original_text: "This is Brasswhisper, which, naturally, is not his real name. The esteemed {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} is a member of my retinue — there are times when I am forced by my duty to the Emperor to deal with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenotechnology{/g}, and Brasswhisper ensures my safety in such moments."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi Brasswhisper ile tanıştırayım. Elbette gerçek adı bu değil. Muazzez {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g}, maiyetimin bir üyesidir. Zaman zaman, İmparator'a olan vazifem gereği {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno teknolojileri{/g} ile ilgilenmem gerekiyor ve böyle anlarda Brasswhisper güvende kalmamı sağlıyor."
